CustomField.description: This field is used in the My Region's Regional Queue Member field on Concierge. This is used to enable the logged-in Regional Controller to see tickets only for his or her region.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used in the My Region's Regional Queue Member field on Concierge. This is used to enable the logged-in Regional Controller to see tickets only for his or her region.
CustomField.label: Is Regional Queue Member
